General.Name: PI Advanced Materials Co. Ltd
General.Description: PI Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of polyimide films and varnishes in South Korea. It offers its products for use in IT, electronic device, automotive, aerospace, and other general industries. The company was formerly known as SKCKOLONPI, Inc. and changed its name to PI Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. in June 2020. PI Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Anyang, South Korea. PI Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Korea PI Holdings Co., Ltd.
